com.pi4j.io.gpio

Interface GpioProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BananaPiGpioProvider, BananaProGpioProvider, BpiGpioProvider, GpioProviderBase, NanoPiGpioProvider, OdroidGpioProvider, OrangePiGpioProvider, RaspiGpioProvider, SimulatedGpioProvider, WiringPiGpioProviderBase

    public interface GpioProvider
    Gpio provider interface.
    Author:
    Robert Savage (http://www.savagehomeautomation.com)
